segment.source: What's new for UWP on Xbox One
segment.target: What's new for UWP on Xbox One

segment.source: Highlights new features for UWP on Xbox One apps.
segment.target: Highlights new features for UWP on Xbox One apps.

segment.source: What's new in the June 2016 Developer Preview for UWP on Xbox One
segment.target: What's new in the June 2016 Developer Preview for UWP on Xbox One

segment.source: The June 2016 Developer Preview release of Universal Windows Platform (UWP) on Xbox One contains the following new features, updates to existing features, and bug fixes.
segment.target: The June 2016 Developer Preview release of Universal Windows Platform (UWP) on Xbox One contains the following new features, updates to existing features, and bug fixes.

segment.source: Mouse mode is now enabled by default
segment.target: Mouse mode is now enabled by default

segment.source: Mouse mode is now enabled by default for all apps.
segment.target: Mouse mode is now enabled by default for all apps.

segment.source: For more information about mouse mode, see Designing for Xbox and TV.
segment.target: For more information about mouse mode, see Designing for Xbox and TV.

segment.source: Extended UWP API surface area is now functional on the console
segment.target: Extended UWP API surface area is now functional on the console

segment.source: Additional UWP APIs are now functional on the Xbox console.
segment.target: Additional UWP APIs are now functional on the Xbox console.

segment.source: For more information about UWP API support, see UWP features that aren't yet supported on Xbox.
segment.target: For more information about UWP API support, see UWP features that aren't yet supported on Xbox.

segment.source: Background music and audio capabilities
segment.target: Background music and audio capabilities

segment.source: You can now play music and audio from an app that is running the background.
segment.target: You can now play music and audio from an app that is running the background.

segment.source: XAML improvements
segment.target: XAML improvements

segment.source: The following improvements have been made to the XAML platform:
segment.target: The following improvements have been made to the XAML platform:

segment.source: The focus rectangle is now styled for a television 10-foot experience.
segment.target: The focus rectangle is now styled for a television 10-foot experience.

segment.source: Xbox sounds are now embedded in the XAML platform.
segment.target: Xbox sounds are now embedded in the XAML platform.

segment.source: XY focus navigation between UI elements has been improved.
segment.target: XY focus navigation between UI elements has been improved.

segment.source: See also
segment.target: See also

segment.target: UWP on Xbox One
